title: Thematic drop
body:
Hi guys i want to ask you about the meaning of THEMATIC DROP
http://imgur.com/MJbZBRp
and thx

replies.body: Every day during snow down, a new chest will appear in the store containing a different theme.  For example, today you'll find the Fired Up chest which has fire-themed content.  Bookmark the[ Snowdown Chest ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/236357867)guide to see what the daily chest is!  Hope that helps clear things up.
